name: Les Sismore - Dash to Enlightenment
description:
Lester Sismore, eccentric Wall-Street trader lost a ton from shorting Gamestop (GME). He has now adopted a new way of life... He wants to throw away all of his material possessions so that he can become enlightened. Not everyone wants to help him on his journey though. 

|||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||

Controls

W,A,S,D or Arrow keys - Movement

Best played with sound.

|||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||

All assets (including voice lines ;) ) except the following were made within the timeframe of the jam.

POLYGON - City Pack + POLYGON - City Characters | 3D characters and city models

Dollar Particle System - Unluck Software | Dollar Particle System

Mixamo Animations | All Animations

Freesound + Zapsplat | Car + Cash Sounds 

|||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||

Art/Programming - Alexander Blomquist

Programming/Design - Jay Blomquist
